naslov: Šolta Stomorska Kuća prvi red do mora (prodaja) (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Newly renovated house for sale in Stomorska in an excellent position, first row to the sea (distance 25 meters). The house is 100m2 with two bedrooms. Each room has its own AC unit, common corridor with bathroom with toilet + separate toilet. The kitchen combined with the living room has access to the terrace and balcony. The 21m2 balcony has a view of the sea and Split. The entrance terrace is 36m2 with a barbecue/grill and continues to the back of the plot, where there is an outdoor shower. Behind the house there is a part of the field of 85m2 ready for landscaping as desired. Garage and storage area is 31m2. 1989 - house was build 2018 - thermal insulation facade 2020 - sectional garage door 2023 - completely new roof and gutters 2023 - new electrical installations For any information, please just call +385 92 262 5027! Prodaje se novouredena kuca u Stomorskoj na odlicnoj poziciji, prvi red do mora (udaljenost 25 metara). Kuca je povrsine 100m2 s dvije spavace sobe. Svaka soba ima svoju klimu, zajednicki hodnik s kupaonicom s wc-om + zasebni wc. Kuhinja s dnevnim boravkom ima izlaz na terasu i balkon. Balkon povrsine 21m2 ima pogled na more i Split. Ulazna terasa je povrsine 36m2 s rostiljem i nastavlja se na straznji dio parcele, gdje se nalazi vanjski tus. Iza kuce se nalazi dio terena od 85m2 spreman za uredenje po zelji. Garaza i spremiste od 31m2. 1989. - izgradena kuca 2018. - termoizolacijska fasada 2020. - sekcijska garazna vrata 2023. - kompletno novi krov i oluci 2023. - nove elektro instalacije Za bilo koje informacije molim samo zvati na 092 262 5027!
